body:
- Fixed player spawning alive and on red team in certain maps
- Fixed black/missing textures after game exit and return [Mobile]
- Fixed server not maintaining correct gamemode after game-over
- Fixed meltdown not being able to hit some blocks
- Fixed client state not resetting after gameover on server
- Fixed units being inaccurate when firing at objects while moving
- Fixed player being able to enter two pads at once
- Fixed overflow gate being slower than usual
- Added quit button [Mobile]
name: v4 Build 79 - Beta - Hotfix
